sentences.english: Dalong Water Control Project is a key project in Hainan Province.
sentences.chinese: 大隆水利枢纽工程是海南省的重点工程。

sentences.english: Express trains don't stop at Princeton junction.
sentences.chinese: 特快列车不在普林斯顿枢纽站停车。

sentences.english: Fourthly, transportation facilities should be optimized and the central region's status as a comprehensive transportation hub should be further consolidated.
sentences.chinese: 四要优化交通资源配置，强化综合交通运输枢纽地位。

sentences.english: The hinge is the point of maximum curvature in a fold.
sentences.chinese: 枢纽是褶曲中弯曲度最大的点。

sentences.english: Takamatsu is the main hub between Shikoku area and the rest of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 高松是四国与日本其它地区之间的主要枢纽。

sentences.english: Electric power step-up substation is the important corollary engineering of Baise hydropower station.
sentences.chinese: 百色水利枢纽升压站是电站工程的重要配套工程。

sentences.english: The hinge of the interaction between falseness and trueness is the supernatural power.
sentences.chinese: 该剧虚实相生的枢纽是超自然力量。

sentences.english: It acts as a “hub” for distributing content to other networks.
sentences.chinese: 它作为一个“枢纽”，把内容发送到其他网站。

sentences.english: Founded in 844, it is an oil-refining and transshipment center. Population, 30,000.
sentences.chinese: 建于844年，是一个石油加工中心和运输枢纽。

sentences.english: Thus Shenzhen became a central hub for railroads, highways, marine transportations and air transportations.
sentences.chinese: 这样深圳成为了铁路，公路，海运和航空的枢纽。

sentences.english: For Wanjiazhai Yellow River Water Control Project and the location of the project leader.
sentences.chinese: 为万家寨水利枢纽工程和引黄工程龙头所在地。

sentences.english: Flinders Street Station, hub of Melbourne's suburban railways.
sentences.chinese: 弗林德斯街站是墨尔本市郊铁路的枢纽。

sentences.english: The Daguangba project is the largest hydro project in Hainan Province.
sentences.chinese: 大广坝水利水电枢纽是海南省最大的水电工程。

sentences.english: Three Gorges Project is the key project for developing and harnessing the Yangtze River.
sentences.chinese: 三峡水利枢纽工程是开发治理长江的关键工程。

sentences.english: Habenula has been regarded as the major link between forebrain structures and midbrain raphe nuclei.
sentences.chinese: 缰核是联系边缘前脑和低位脑干的枢纽。

sentences.english: After the construction of Gezhouba Dam, sturgeon resources in Yangtze River have declined notably.
sentences.chinese: 葛洲坝枢纽建成后，长江鲟鱼类资源显著衰退。

definition: variant of 連接|连接[lian2 jie1]
to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
Eurasian land bridge (rail line linking China and Europe)
